      • hasMatch

        public int hasMatch(ZigBeeEndpoint device)
        Returns a score based on the number of endpoints supported by the device that match those in the target device.

        If the device is a direct match to the device type, then we return the maximum score

        Specified by:
        hasMatch in interface DeviceFactory
        Returns:
        int score being the number of endpoints supported
